successes.title: Deadzone: Infestation Sci-fi Skirmish Game
successes.description: Deadzone is the science fiction miniatures skirmish game where two Strike Teams battle in a wartorn urban battlezone!

Pledges.description:
THANK YOU FOR BACKING! 
This reward level is perfect if you just want to pledge for add-ons. * Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)

OUTBREAK
Get the new Hardback Deadzone Core Rulebook, the Alien Planet Gaming Mat, and a digital copies of the Deadzone Rulebook and Infestation Mission Pack. Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)

Get the all-new Industrial Battezones Terrain in this simple package, plus some great accessories and ruins sprues. The terrain is suitable for any sci-fi wargame, and contains enough scenery to densely cover a 2’x2’ gaming board, or build an industrial complex and scatter terrain for a larger wargames table. *Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)

EARLY BIRD QUARANTINE
The perfect way to get started with Deadzone, or add to an existing collection.
Get the new Hardback Deadzone Core Rulebook, Deadzone: Infestation Mission Pack, Enforcer Pathfinders and Veer-myn Night-crawlers. You will also get Industrial Battlezones Scenery, Red Planet Gaming Mat, any cards and counters you need to play PLUS the Veer-myn special character “The Piper” in Kickstarter Exclusive Resin, AND any applicable Stretch Goals! *Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)

QUARANTINE
The perfect way to get started with Deadzone, or add to an existing collection.
Get the new Hardback Deadzone Core Rulebook, Deadzone: Infestation Mission Pack, Enforcer Pathfinders and Veer-myn Night-crawlers. You will also get Industrial Battlezones Scenery, Red Planet Gaming Mat, any cards and counters you need to play PLUS the Veer-myn special character “The Piper” in Kickstarter Exclusive Resin, AND any applicable Stretch Goals! *Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)

LOCK DOWN
Everything you need to play and an incredible deal on all of the new Deadzone goodies!
Get the new Hardback Deadzone Core Rulebook, Deadzone: Infestation Mission Pack, Enforcer Pathfinders, Jetbikes, Veer-myn Night-crawlers and Shredders. There are also two Battlezones Industrial Districts, durable Deluxe Gaming Mat, Deadzone Infestation Faction Boosters, any cards and counters you need to play PLUS commemorative Kickstarter Exclusive signed Art Print, digital content AND “The Piper” and Blaine on Jetbike in Kickstarter Exclusive Resin. This pledge level also includes any applicable Stretch Goals! *Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
